unlekker.util

Class UIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • unlekker.util.UIO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, processing.core.PConstants

    public class UIO
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, processing.core.PConstants
    Utility functions related to file IO, such as producing auto-incrementing filename sequences and listing directories.
    Author:
    Marius Watz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getIncrementalFolder

        public static java.lang.String getIncrementalFolder(java.lang.String nameFormat)
        Function for creating auto-incremented directories with a name format specified by the nameFormat parameter, which should be a String looking like the following: "SimpleName ####". The name becomes the prefix, while the hashes are turned into padded number strings. This function will try to find the next correct name, and then create the directory.
        Parameters:
        nameFormat -
        Returns:

      • getIncrementalFilename

        public static java.lang.String getIncrementalFilename(java.lang.String nameFormat,
                                      java.lang.String path)
